Title: Inception
Description: A skilled thief, the absolute best in the dangerous art of extraction, stealing valuable secrets from deep within the subconscious during the dream state.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: A genre often exploring futuristic and imaginative concepts, such as advanced technology or space exploration.

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.Bio: Renowned British-American filmmaker known for complex and visually striking movies like Inception and The Dark Knight.

Title: The Dark Knight
Description: When the menace known as The Joker emerges, he causes chaos and havoc among the people of Gotham.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: A genre characterized by physical feats, intense combat, and exciting sequences.

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.Bio: Renowned British-American filmmaker known for complex and visually striking movies like Inception and The Dark Knight.

Title: Interstellar
Description: A group of astronauts travel through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

Genre.Name: Adventure
Genre.Description: A genre featuring exploration, daring quests, and new experiences.

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.Bio: Renowned British-American filmmaker known for complex and visually striking movies like Inception and The Dark Knight.

Title: The Godfather
Description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

Genre.Name: Crime
Genre.Description: A genre focusing on criminal acts, investigations, and their consequences.

Director.Name: Francis Ford Coppola
Director.Bio: American director, producer, and screenwriter famous for The Godfather series.

Title: Pulp Fiction
Description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster, and his wife intertwine in a series of criminal events.

Genre.Name: Crime
Genre.Description: A genre focusing on criminal acts, investigations, and their consequences.

Director.Name: Quentin Tarantino
Director.Bio: American filmmaker known for stylized, non-linear storytelling.

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Description: Two imprisoned men bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: A genre that focuses on realistic storytelling, emotions, and character development.

Director.Name: Frank Darabont
Director.Bio: Hungarian-American director known for The Shawshank Redemption.

Title: Fight Club
Description: An insomniac office worker and a soap salesman form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: A genre that focuses on realistic storytelling, emotions, and character development.

Director.Name: David Fincher
Director.Bio: American director known for Fight Club and suspenseful storytelling.

Title: Forrest Gump
Description: The story of Forrest Gump, a man with a low IQ who achieves great things in life.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: A genre that focuses on realistic storytelling, emotions, and character development.

Director.Name: Robert Zemeckis
Director.Bio: American filmmaker famous for Forrest Gump and Back to the Future.

Title: The Matrix
Description: A computer hacker discovers the truth about his reality and joins a rebellion to fight for freedom.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: A genre often exploring futuristic and imaginative concepts, such as advanced technology or space exploration.

Director.Name: The Wachowskis
Director.Bio: Siblings who directed The Matrix and are known for groundbreaking visual effects.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

Genre.Name: Fantasy
Genre.Description: A genre set in fictional worlds with magical elements and extraordinary adventures.

Director.Name: Peter Jackson
Director.Bio: New Zealand filmmaker known for The Lord of the Rings trilogy.
